# 🎄 Advent of Code 2023 🎄

[![AoC](https://badgen.net/badge/AoC/2023/blue)](https://adventofcode.com/2023)

## Installation

``` node
npm i
```

## Running in dev mode

``` node
npm start <day>
npm start 01
```

Example:

``` node
npm start 1
```
